node.title: Lecture 2 – Dr. Moeen Nizami
node.content:
Lecture 2 – Dr. Moeen Nizami

MODULE 1: اقبال کی معنویت و ناگزیریت

Topic: اقبال کی اہمیت بطور شاعر

 

 

Dr. MOEEN NIZAMI
Professor,
Dept.of Persian,Oriental College,
University of the Punjab,Old Campus,Lahore,Pakistan.

Mr. Nizami has obtained his Ph.D. in 2001 in Persian Language & Literature from University of the Punjab after getting his M.A. degree in the same subject and institution. He has been teaching for twenty years in capacity of Professor, Associate Professor, lecturer and along with in many ranks and designation in different institution like University of the Punjab, Iran Culture Centre, Cultural Conciliate, Iran Embassy in Islamabad. He has been serving as administrative capacity such as Chairman and Head of different department in University of the Punjab. He has already attended several conferences, seminars and workshops in local and internationally. He has many publications in his credit such as research papers and many of published books. He has also supervised many Ph.D and M.Phil students.

Research Interests
Classical and modern Persian Literature, Islamic Arts, Sufism, Sufi Orders in South Asia, Common Cultural heritage of Iran, Central Asia,, Afghanistan, Turkey and Sub-continent, Literary translation, Creative writing in Persian, Urdu, Punjabi, Rumi Studies and Iqbal Studies.
